Sentencas: In a previous work by the authors, the performance of a plant based on solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) which produces its own fuel by solar energy had been studied.
Titulo: Towards synthesis optimization of a fuel-cell based plant

Sentencas: The system consists not only of the fuel/ electrolytic cell unit and the gas turbine but also of compressors, pumps, heat exchangers, etc.
Titulo: Towards synthesis optimization of a fuel-cell based plant

Sentencas: In the aforementioned work, a workable synthesis (structure) of the system had been considered, which is not necessarily the best one.
Titulo: Towards synthesis optimization of a fuel-cell based plant

Sentencas: In the meantime, an attempt has been made to improve on the structure and, if possible, to determine the one with the best performance under certain conditions.
Titulo: Towards synthesis optimization of a fuel-cell based plant

Sentencas: For this purpose, the Pinch method together with exergy analysis has been applied, while the performance of the system for any configuration has been determined by a simulation model.
Titulo: Towards synthesis optimization of a fuel-cell based plant

Sentencas: The results of this work are presented in this article.
Titulo: Towards synthesis optimization of a fuel-cell based plant
